actionCalls.description: The Route Work action is used to input the routing requirements to Omni-Channel. This example shows routing to a defined Queue.
actionCalls.name: RouteToSouth
actionCalls.label: Route to South

decisions.description: This example decision node looks at the Contact that is calling and decides which Queue they should be routed to. Here, it checks both the name and country of the customer.
decisions.name: CustomerRoutingDecision
decisions.label: How should the customer be routed?

Flow.interviewLabel: Voice Calls Routed to Agents and Queues {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: Voice Calls Routed to Agents and Queues

subflows.description: Agent routing fault queue from GE
subflows.name: Fault_Queues_Flow
subflows.label: Fault Queues Flow

variables.description: The voice call record that is being inputted into the flow. Necessary for the flow to run.
variables.name: input_record

variables.description: The ID of the record being inputted into the flow. Necessary for the flow to run.
variables.name: recordId
